thread.title: Here's how you can watch Mets-Dodgers Game 2
thread.title_full: Here's how you can watch Mets-Dodgers Game 2 | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: reviewjournal.com
title: Here's how you can watch Mets-Dodgers Game 2
text:
The National League Division Series between the New York Mets and the Los Angeles Dodgers continues tonight at Dodger Stadium in Los Angeles. The Mets lead the series 1-0 after a 3-1 win over the Dodgers Friday night.
Here's everything you need to know if you want to catch the game.
Time: 6:07 p.m. PDT
TV: TBS (DirecTV 247, Cox 7, Century Link 113, Dish 139)
Schedule through Game five (all times PDT):
Game 3: Dodgers at Mets — Monday, Oct. 12, TBD — TBS
Game 4: Dodgers at Mets — Tuesday, Oct. 13, 5:00 p.m. — TBS
Game 5: Mets at Dodgers — Thursday, Oct. 15, 5:00 p.m. — TBS
Here's how you can watch...
